description:
Very simple set of standard Git config on Windows

    core.autocrlf       true
    core.safecrlf       false
    rebase.autosquash   true
    help.format         html
    push.default        simple
    core.editor         Notepad++

    diff.tool           DiffMerge
    diff.guitool        DiffMerge
    merge.tool          DiffMerge
author: Various
